principles: Early networks are small; avoid weights that amplify collusion or single points of failure.
Metrics must be verifiable; avoid self-reported or subjective signals early.
Never link diversity or social signals directly to payouts.
Keep rewards mocked and non-competitive until anti-gaming safeguards exist.
activation_preconditions: >= 95% job success rate sustained for 6+ months in mock mode
Auditable anti-gaming checks (e.g., verified compute proofs)
wallet_guidance: Wallets represent identity + mocked credits/points only
Separate creator and operator tracks within the same wallet
Avoid overloading wallets with multiple high-stakes roles early
